visualizations.name: Tuition vs Earnings Chart
visualizations.description: Shows the relationship between total 4-year tuition costs and median earnings 2 years after graduation

visualizations.name: ROI Comparison by Field
visualizations.description: Side-by-side comparison showing 5-year ROI calculated based on tuition and debt

visualizations.name: Payback Period by Field
visualizations.description: Estimated years to repay student debt assuming 25% tax rate and 10% of post-tax income to debt repayment

visualizations.name: Debt-to-Income Ratio Rankings
visualizations.description: Horizontal bar chart showing estimated debt as a multiple of annual earnings
